titleStmt.title: The copie of a letter written unto Sir Edward Dering, lately put out of the house, and committed unto the Tower, Feb. 2. 1641. His books censured to be burnt by the common executioner, for his strange unadvised and sudden differing from himself, and opposing the whole House. : Which letter was sent as is supposed, by a worthy member of the House of Commons, Feb. 4, 1641.
titleStmt.author: Pym, John, 1584-1643.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Pym by Wing.
Reproduction of original in: William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, University of California, Los Angeles, California.
